model.classes

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.classes.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    CS252 Object-Oriented Programming
    Deck Class. This class is instansiated once and contains every card at the beggining of the game, and is used to keep track of the cards that are not in the player's hands. They are in an ArrayList and not a stack (That cards are traditionally in) So we can pull random cards off the deck without the need to shuffle them.
    Author:
    George Kokiadis csd3962@csd.uoc.gr

    • Method Detail

      • getCardFromDeck

        public Card getCardFromDeck(int deck)
        Return a random card from the appropriate deck, and also remove it from the deck.
        Pre Conditions : deck is within the range 1-3
        Post Conditions : Returns a valid card object, and deletes the card from the deck.
        Parameters:
        deck - 1 for a TrainCard, 2 for a destinationCard, 3 for a BigCityCard.
        Returns:
        Card that was picked
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - When deck number is invalid as an unchecked exception.
